TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlMeta extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 可讓您以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML tag on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的 html 提供以程式設計方式存取``在伺服器上的項目。The control provides programmatic access to the HTML `` element on the server. HTML``項目是轉譯的頁面上，相關資料的容器，但是沒有分頁內容本身。The HTML `` element is a container for data about the rendered page, but not page content itself. ``之間的開頭和結尾的 HTML 標記放置``項目。The `` tag is placed between the opening and closing HTML `` elements. 每個``元素會描述中繼資料屬性名稱和其關聯的值。Each `` element describes a metadata property name and its associated value. 使用控制項的屬性來指定中繼資料屬性名稱，而屬性來指定中繼資料屬性值。Use the control's property to specify the metadata property name, and the property to specify the metadata property value. 使用屬性來指定如何解譯的中繼資料屬性的使用者代理程式的其他資訊。Use the property to specify additional information to user agents on how to interpret the metadata property. 使用屬性取代時產生的中繼資料屬性將會使用 HTTP 擷取的屬性。Use the property in place of the property when the resulting metadata property will be retrieved using HTTP. 您可以取得分頁來參考``項目使用屬性物件。You can get a reference to the page `` element using the property of the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來定義 HTML 控制項``Web 網頁的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 兩個``項目定義、 建立一個關鍵字，描述頁面和一個清單中的日期清單中的網頁。Two `` elements are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體控制項。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 中繼 」 常值字串。The "meta" literal string.| ## Examples 如需如何使用的範例建構函式，請參閱類別概觀主題。For an example of how to use the constructor, see the class overview topic.

.property instance string Content
Public Overridable Property Content As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Content { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定由 控制項定義的中繼資料屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the metadata property value defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，搭配屬性，定義的中繼資料屬性的頁面。The property, together with the property, defines a metadata property of the page. 屬性轉譯為`content`產生的 HTML 屬性``項目。The property is rendered to the `content` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來定義 HTML 控制項``Web 網頁的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 兩個``項目定義、 建立一個關鍵字，描述頁面和一個清單中的日期清單中的網頁。Two `` elements are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 屬性用來定義`content`每個屬性``標記。The property is used to define the `content` attribute for each `` tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定包含在 HTTP 回應標頭中的 控制項屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets an control property that is included in the HTTP response header.

value.span: HTTP 回應標頭項目的名稱。

span.span: The name of the HTTP response header item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性取代屬性來識別應該包含在 HTTP 要求的回應標頭的資訊。Use the property in place of the property to identify information that should be included in the response headers of an HTTP request. 屬性轉譯為`http-equiv`產生的 HTML 屬性``項目。The property is rendered to the `http-equiv` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element.

Public Overridable Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定由 控制項定義的中繼資料屬性名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the metadata property name defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，搭配屬性，定義的中繼資料屬性的頁面。The property, together with the property, defines a metadata property of the page. 屬性轉譯為`name`產生的 HTML 屬性``項目。The property is rendered to the `name` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來定義 HTML 控制項``Web 網頁的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 兩個``標記定義，建立一個關鍵字，描述頁面和一個清單中的日期清單中的網頁。Two `` tags are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 屬性用來定義`name`每個屬性``標記。The property is used to define the `name` attribute of each `` tag. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 用來在用戶端瀏覽器上呈現 控制項內容的 。

span.span: The used to render the control's content on the client's browser.

summary.span: 使用指定的 物件，呈現 控制項至用戶端瀏覽器。

span.span: Renders the control to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制呈現HTML 括號 (/ >) 上``項目，如果用戶端瀏覽器 XHTML 相容。The control renders a HTML bracket (/>) on the `` element if the client's browser is XHTML compliant. 如需有關如何設定 ASP.NET 非 XHTML 轉譯的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 設定 ASP.NET 網站中的 XHTML 轉譯](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)。For more information on configuring ASP.NET for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).

para.span: 在擴充控制，請覆寫方法以提供自訂轉譯。

span.span: When extending the control, override the method to provide custom rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Scheme { get; set; }
.property instance string Scheme
Public Overridable Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性 (Attribute)，此屬性可用來解譯由 控制項定義的中繼資料屬性 (Property) 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a attribute used to interpret the metadata property value defined by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定`scheme`呈現的 HTML 屬性``項目。The property allows you to specify a `scheme` attribute of the rendered HTML `` element. `scheme`屬性可以用來提供使用者代理程式，例如用戶端瀏覽器或搜尋引擎，解譯的中繼資料屬性的其他內容。The `scheme` attribute can be used to provide user agents, such as client browsers or search engines, additional context for interpreting the metadata property. 屬性轉譯為`scheme`產生的 HTML 屬性``項目。The property is rendered to the `scheme` attribute of the resulting HTML `` element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來定義 HTML 控制項``Web 網頁的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to define HTML `` elements for a Web page. 兩個``標記定義，建立一個關鍵字，描述頁面和一個清單中的日期清單中的網頁。Two `` tags are defined, one listing keywords describing the page and one listing the date the page was created. 屬性適用於日期相關``標記，以協助使用者代理程式讀取的日期值。The property is used for the date-related `` tag to aid user agents reading the date value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlMeta/vb/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
